alert.note: Alert for North Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Cass County through 230 PM CDT... At 200 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walker, to near Akeley, to 7 miles south of Nevis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hackensack around 215 PM CDT. Backus around 225 PM CDT. Longville and Woman Lake around 230 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Whipholt, Pheasant Lake, Webb Lake, Ten Mile Lake and Big Portage Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
